items.details: Version 1.4 introduces an AI-powered study assistant that helps you create personalized study plans, suggests resources based on your subjects, and provides real-time assistance during study sessions. This feature aims to enhance your productivity and learning experience.

items.description: Introduced dark mode and enhanced security features
items.details: Version 1.3 brings a complete visual overhaul with dark mode for better eye comfort during long study sessions. We've also implemented enhanced security protocols to protect user data and added two-factor authentication for account protection.

items.description: Added real-time notifications and improved UI
items.details: Real-time notifications keep you updated when friends join study sessions or when it's time for your scheduled break. The UI has been completely redesigned for better usability and a more intuitive experience.
This update focused on stability and performance. We fixed critical bugs related to session management and optimized the app for faster load times and smoother interactions.
The official launch of StudiLib! This release includes all core features: group study sessions, shared timers, voice calls, goal tracking, and community dashboard.

items.description: Closed beta testing with select users
items.details: We launched our closed beta program with a select group of students. This phase helped us identify critical issues and gather valuable feedback before the public release.
The first alpha version was released to a small group of testers. This early build showcased the core concept of StudiLib and collected initial user feedback.
